sys_script.name: Validate Start and End Dates

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_f0b973979fd012107f444ad75524ab5a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_loaner_req_loaner_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate Start and End Dates</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (current.end_date < current.start_date) {
		gs.addErrorMessage('End date must be later than start date!');
		current.end_date='';
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		// This rejects the submission of the record if you set the end date before the start date
		// Food for thought: why was script used here rather than a scriptless business rule?
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-03 07:27:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f0b973979fd012107f444ad75524ab5a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Start and End Dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_cdltd_loaner_req">99c30f4f9fd012107f444ad75524ab2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">99c30f4f9fd012107f444ad75524ab2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f0b973979fd012107f444ad75524ab5a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-03 07:27:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f0b973979fd012107f444ad75524ab5a"/></record_update>
